channel.title: Human-AI Interaction on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Human-AI Interaction on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Beyond Single Stationary Policies: Meta-Task Players as Naturally Superior Collaborators
item.description: AI struggles with collaborating effectively with humans due to unpredictable human behavior. This paper introduces Collaborative Bayesian Policy Reuse (CBPR), a novel framework that leverages meta-ta…

item.title: Enhancing Preference-based Linear Bandits via Human Response Time
item.description: Boosting preference learning, this research uses human response times to improve linear bandit algorithms, significantly accelerating preference identification.

item.title: Language Grounded Multi-agent Reinforcement Learning with Human-interpretable Communication
item.description: LangGround: MARL agents learn human-interpretable communication via LLM-grounded training, enabling effective human-agent collaboration.

item.title: Learning to Assist Humans without Inferring Rewards
item.description: AI agents trained with Empowerment via Successor Representations (ESR) empower humans by maximizing their control over environmental outcomes, eliminating the need for human intention inference, unlik…

item.title: MambaTalk: Efficient Holistic Gesture Synthesis with Selective State Space Models
item.description: MambaTalk: Efficient holistic gesture synthesis using selective state space models to overcome computational complexity and improve gesture quality.

item.title: Posture-Informed Muscular Force Learning for Robust Hand Pressure Estimation
item.description: PiMForce: Robust hand pressure estimation using 3D hand posture and sEMG!

item.title: Pricing and Competition for Generative AI
item.description: Generative AI’s unique characteristics necessitate new pricing strategies; this paper models a sequential pricing game between competing firms, revealing the first-mover’s performance needs to be sign…

item.title: SpGesture: Source-Free Domain-adaptive sEMG-based Gesture Recognition with Jaccard Attentive Spiking Neural Network
item.description: SpGesture: A source-free domain-adaptive SEMG gesture recognition system using a novel Spiking Jaccard Attentive Neural Network achieves real-time performance with high accuracy.

item.title: Towards Human-AI Complementarity with Prediction Sets
item.description: Greedy algorithms outperform conformal prediction in creating prediction sets that maximize human expert accuracy in classification tasks.

item.title: VASA-1: Lifelike Audio-Driven Talking Faces Generated in Real Time
item.description: VASA-1: Real-time, lifelike talking faces generated from a single image and audio!
